info: The Project will enhance climate smart agriculture development and practices  focused on strengthening Low Carbong Agriculture (LCA) policies and institutions; establishing infrastructure support for agri-waste management; and, enhancing LCA technology and development transfer. These will be parts of climate change (CC) mitigation and adaptation measures to reduce green house gas (GHG) emission in 19 provinces of Viet Nam.
name: LOW CARBON AGRICULTURAL SUPPORT PROJECT
